home.metaTitle: Home - Khelifi Conseils | Event Equipment Rentals
home.metaDesc: At Khelifi Conseils, we are passionate about creating unforgettable moments. Specializing in event equipment rentals, we offer a wide range of high-quality gear for all your needs, from weddings and birthdays to conferences and festivals.
home.catDescription: Take a look at our categories
home.exploreBuffet: <1>Optimize your space</1>  with modern buffet equipment

shop.metaTitle: Shop - Khelifi Conseils | Event Equipment Rentals
shop.metaDesc: Browse our extensive range of event equipment rentals at Khelifi Conseils. From tents to sound systems, find everything you need for your next event.

productDetail.metaTitle: Product Details - Khelifi Conseils | Event Rentals
productDetail.metaDesc: Get detailed information about our event equipment rentals at Khelifi Conseils. Find specifications, pricing, and availability.
productDetail.errorMsg: Click twice if both dates are the same

login.metaDesc: Log in to your Khelifi Conseils account to manage your event equipment rentals and bookings.

register.metaDesc: Create a new account at Khelifi Conseils to start renting event equipment and manage your bookings.
register.title: Create your account

cart.metaTitle: Cart - Khelifi Conseils | Event Equipment Rentals
cart.metaDesc: Review the items in your cart before completing your event equipment rental purchase at Khelifi Conseils.

checkout.metaDesc: Place your order for event equipment rentals and reservations at Khelifi Conseils quickly and securely.
checkout.title: Billing details
checkout.note: Orders can only be confirmed with a down payment of 40% of the total amount see
checkout.modalityDesc: Payments are made in accordance with the following option: 40 % One month in advance on the event date and the remainder to be paid by cheque or cash on the day of delivery.
checkout.modalityAccepted: I have read and accept terms & conditions
checkout.orderPlacedDsc: Your order has been placed successfully!

footer.aboutDesc: At Khelifi Conseils, we are passionate about creating unforgettable moments. Specializing in event equipment rentals, we offer a wide range of high-quality gear for all your needs, from weddings and birthdays to conferences and festivals

contact.metaDesc: Get in touch with Khelifi Conseils for any inquiries about our event equipment rental services.
contact.title: Get In Touch With Us
contact.desc: For More Information About Our Product & Services. Please Feel Free To Drop Us An Email. Our Staff Always Be There To Help You Out. Do Not Hesitate!
